description:
Hit jackpots and increase your prestige to unlock new games. Get the ladies' attention, and eventually make it to the top of the millionaire list! 

Features:
★ Unlock 10 different casino games
★ Unlock and upgrade 7 characters
★ Increase your future winnings with upgrades 
★ Get to the Global Highscore list of millionaires
★ Hit the jackpot to be announced among all the players
★ Unlimited free spins and daily rewards that scale with your level!
★ Try out high-quality, unique slot machine themes (feel the Las Vegas vibe!)

Disclaimer:
- Slots game is intended for adult audience (21+) and for entertainment purposes only.
- Playing or succeeding in this game does not imply future success in real money gambling.
- The game does not offer real money gambling or the opportunity to win real money or real prizes.
name: All in Casino Girls
intro: Spin the slot machines to spin the casino girls around!
